div.div: College of Wooster vs. Ohio Wesleyan Univ.

tr.td: * Wooster wins the toss and will receive, OWU will defend S goal.
A. Sanfillipo kickoff 57 yards to the WOO8, Brandon Adams return 18 yards to the WOO26 (Michael Smosny;Cameron Smith).
Gary Muntean pass incomplete to Antonio Bailey.
Antonio Bailey rush for no gain to the WOO26 (Mason Tomblin;Keaton Leppla).
Gary Muntean sacked for loss of 6 yards to the WOO20 (Gary Brodek).
Lane Dailey punt 28 yards to the WOO48, downed.
OHIO WESLEYAN UNIV. drive start at 13:50.
Alex Barrett rush for 2 yards to the WOO46 (K. Phillips;Kevin Komara).
Dominick Orsini pass complete to Alex Barrett for 4 yards to the WOO42 (K. Phillips;Marcus Bowers).
Dominick Orsini pass complete to Adrian Bishop for 13 yards to the WOO29, 1ST DOWN OWU (Patrick Johnson).
Dominick Orsini pass complete to Adrian Bishop for 6 yards to the WOO23 (Kevin Komara;C. Santos).

Gary Muntean pass complete to Tyson Vogel for 6 yards to the WOO29.
